elements.title: Claire Rousay (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Claire Rousay (pictured) creates music using everyday sounds she records?

elements.title: Black Souls (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Annie Nathan Meyer's Black Souls was one of the first "lynching dramas" created by a white woman?

elements.title: Ray E. Dillon Jr. (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ray E. Dillon Jr. flew in 92 combat missions during World War II before becoming the president and CEO of Dillons?

elements.title: Innocence (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Kaija Saariaho's 2021 opera Innocence includes traditional Finnish cow-herding calls?

elements.title: Megan Barton-Hanson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Megan Barton-Hanson dated her costars from Love Island 4, Celebs Go Dating, and Ex on the Beach, but not Hey Tracey!?

elements.title: throat lozenge (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the packaging of one Thai throat lozenge features five centipedes?

elements.title: Twink Twining (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Dr. Twink Twining was a Major League Baseball player?

elements.title: eyelash seaweed (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that eyelash seaweed may have been made extinct by a single 2016 earthquake?
